name: Hexacore (itch)
description:
Match 5 hexagon neighbors or more:
  • Right mouse button rotates clockwise
  • Left mouse button rotates counter clockwise

Note: No fail state restart manually if you can't find matches.

Right click to rotate clockwise. Left for counterclockwise.Match 5 or more.Special thanks
ObsidianBLK for his HexCell code
https://obsidianblk.itch.io/

BitBionic for sounds
https://itch.io/profile/bitbionic

Joosh at HellaDecentGames for feedback and ideas 
https://www.twitch.tv/helladecentgames

FrozenWell for his continued support
https://frozen-well-studios.itch.io/
